pr_title: Initial support for MatchPredicates in Device REST API

timeline.message:

Signed-off-by: Claudio Mezzasalma <claudio.mezzasalma@eurotech.com>

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/service/api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/kapua/model/query/predicate/AttributePredicate.java b/service/api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/kapua/model/query/predicate/AttributePredicate.java index 619fd3b41c..2f50fb41ef 100644 --- a/service/api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/kapua/model/query/predicate/AttributePredicate.java +++ b/service/api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/kapua/model/query/predicate/AttributePredicate.java @@ -24,51 +24,51 @@ public interface AttributePredicate extends QueryPredicate { *

* Determines how the values of the result set are compared with the given {@link AttributePredicate#getAttributeValue()} * - * @since 1.0.0 + * @since 1.3.0 */ enum Operator { /** - * {@link #EQUAL} {@link Operator} + * {@literal #EQUAL} {@link Operator} *

* Matches results with the same value. * - * @since 1.0.0 + * @since 1.3.0 */ EQUAL, /** - * {@link #NOT_EQUAL} {@link Operator} + * {@literal #NOT_EQUAL} {@link Operator} *

* Matches results with not the same value. * - * @since 1.0.0 + * @since 1.3.0 */ NOT_EQUAL, /** - * {@link #IS_NULL} {@link Operator} + * {@literal #IS_NULL} {@link Operator} *

* Matches results with value {@code null}. * - * @since 1.0.0 + * @since 1.3.0 */ IS_NULL, /** - * {@link #NOT_NULL} {@link Operator} + * {@literal #NOT_NULL} {@link Operator} *

* Matches results with value NOT {@code null}. * - * @since 1.0.0 + * @since 1.3.0 */ NOT_NULL, /** - * {@link #STARTS_WITH} {@link Operator} + * {@literal #STARTS_WITH} {@link Operator} *

* Matches results with value that starts with the given value. * To be used with {@link String} {@link org.eclipse.kapua.model.KapuaEntityAttributes}. * - * @since 1.0.0 + * @since 1.3.0 */ STARTS_WITH,

timeline.author: Coduz
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -83,6 +94,18 @@ */ LIKE, + /** + * {@link #LIKE} {@link Operator} but case insensitive + *

+ * Matches results with value that are like (in SQL fashion) the given value case insensitive. + * To be used with {@link String} {@link org.eclipse.kapua.model.KapuaEntityAttributes}. + *

+ * If you want to match only the beginning of the {@link String} please consider using {@link #STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE}. + * + * @since 1.2.0

diff --git a/service/api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/kapua/model/query/predicate/AttributePredicate.java b/service/api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/kapua/model/query/predicate/AttributePredicate.java index 619fd3b41c..2f50fb41ef 100644 --- a/service/api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/kapua/model/query/predicate/AttributePredicate.java +++ b/service/api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/kapua/model/query/predicate/AttributePredicate.java @@ -78,19 +78,19 @@ public interface AttributePredicate extends QueryPredicate { * Matches results with value that starts with the given value, case insensitive. * To be used with {@link String} {@link org.eclipse.kapua.model.KapuaEntityAttributes}. * - * @since 1.2.0 + * @since 1.3.0 */ STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE, /** - * {@link #LIKE} {@link Operator} + * {@literal #LIKE} {@link Operator} *

* Matches results with value that are like (in SQL fashion) the given value. * To be used with {@link String} {@link org.eclipse.kapua.model.KapuaEntityAttributes}. *

* If you want to match only the beginning of the {@link String} please consider using {@link #STARTS_WITH}. * - * @since 1.0.0 + * @since 1.3.0 */ LIKE,
